website_summaries.verdict: A good option for smaller R-Pod RV trailers commonly found and used as personal travel trailers.
pros: Uses a three-ply fabric that provides better-than-average weather, dust, and UV protection
Elasticized hem corners for custom fit
Easy to roll up and store when not in use
Comes with a convenient storage bag
cons: Doesn't cover the hitch to provide rust protection

customer_reviews.title: Great service, but.......
customer_reviews.text: Nice cover, great design, lasted ONE season. Just went to put in on today, it started a small rip, which just ire like paper. This was stored inside, totally dry, yet still tore, and once it starts on this fabric, throw it in the trash, it's done. On the upside, I filled out their warranty form online, they got back to me in 2 business days with a tracking number for the replacement they’re sending. I’m impressed. Excellent service. I still give them four stars, it is a great design, hope this one lasts longer.
customer_reviews.author: John Smith

customer_reviews.title: Fits beautifully, covers well and is easy to tie down
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I got this cover on pretty easily, using a ladder. It's pretty easy to get into the camper, even with it covered, because the zippers are so accessible. This is NOT waterproof, but should keep the grit off it when we aren't camping. We've had it on for a couple months, so I can't attest to how long it will last. It fits our 2018 RPOD 179 perfectly over the A/C and TV antenna - snug once you tighten the straps, but not TOO tight. We even had enough room to pull it over the spare tire in back.
customer_reviews.author: Scouting in VT

customer_reviews.title: Nice fit for our R-Pod 179
customer_reviews.text: Nice fit for our R-Pod 179. Material could be made a bit better however when you invest in a camper for a new R-pod you want to protect it so we think this was a good purchase. I like to uncover the snow asap when it has accumulated on it and it is easy with a push broom and ladder. The material on the cover makes the snow quickly and easily slide right off the tear drop shape of the campers back side.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our needs
customer_reviews.text: For what I wanted this is perfect. I was a little skeptical ordering this for the price I thought it might be of poor quality. I will admit it is made of thinner material but so far (three months) it is holding up very well. It comes in a nice reusable bag. This cover is very easy to put on, has breathing panels at the top edges which is great to evaporate any moisture/condensation that may get trapped. The cover also has plenty of room for the air conditioner and TV antenna. the only negative side...I wished there were a couple more straps to secure the cover to the frame at the corners.
customer_reviews.author: Dennist

customer_reviews.title: Fits my R Pod 180, nice rip-stop fabric.
customer_reviews.text: It fits my R Pod 180 with antenna and rooftop A/C well. It takes two people to put on. We used two broom handles to get it started, one person on each side of the front of the camper. Then we needed a ladder to get it over the the roof. IT then slipped over the rest of the camper and two straps go underneath to keep it from blowing awau. It is new so I don't know how it will weather over the winter yet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fits the r-pod 180 perfectly.
customer_reviews.text: Fits our 2018 r-pod 180 perfectly. We do have an air conditioner and the Thule awning and they don’t create a problem. We found it easiest to put it on with 3 people helping. Two with ladders to get out over the top and one to keep it secure on one end while you pull it to the other end. We used 3 inch foam inside a plastic bag to pad each of the corners corners to prevent tearing. We’ll see how it holds up in the snow and winter weather. We like the zippered panel by the door which provides access to the inside of the trailer
customer_reviews.author: PattyB

customer_reviews.title: Good cover.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this cover for a Starcraft Satellite 16ks even though it is R-pod specific. Appears well made. Keep in mind this is constructed of a woven fabric which is much lighter than the multi ply non woven used for many covers. Make sure you have calm winds to attempt to installI as essentially you have parachute. I taped some folded rags on ends of rain gutters on trailer so as to prevent punctures. Cover firs perfectly with exception of location of covers door opening, no problem. My main purpose of cover is keeping sun off surfaces during summer storage. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: NOVA

customer_reviews.title: Poor value overall.
customer_reviews.text: I like the way the product fit our rpod, what I didn't like is that it started tearing after one winter, had to gorilla tape holes after second winter and this fall it pretty much turned to tissue paper. Good fit, poor quality materials, I wouldn't mind spending the money or even a bit more if they could increase the value by using higher quality materials. We'll be purchasing a tarp to cover this winter and I would suggest you do the same instead of waisting nearly $200 on this product.
customer_reviews.author: Alaska Grown =)

customer_reviews.title: Good fit for a winne drop!
customer_reviews.text: Good fit for my winne drop 1790, door is in the right place and the cover should help keep the sun from cooking our new camper. Material is thin but it has a lifetime warranty so if it let’s go who cares! You get a new one. Getting it on for the first time sucks, it’s packed into the smallest package to fit in the bag not for ease on install. Best bet it to spread it out first and use some strategy before you get it up on the roof and spread it out.
customer_reviews.author: The big tuna lv

customer_reviews.title: Rips easily
customer_reviews.text: Rip stop is not true. I have bought 2 of these over the last 2 years, both failed and ripped, just in storage lot, don’t tow with cover on. I bought 2nd since I love the fit and I did t patch the numerous tears that pop as I should have. But the 2nd time, I did. Just a couple weeks ago, went to trailer to see it in the ground on both sides, torn lengthwise, so I don’t see any ripstop fabric. I live in men’s in UT, not crazy winds or anything.
customer_reviews.author: Michele Davis

customer_reviews.title: Wrong size
customer_reviews.text: Nice cover but didn’t fit my 2019 rpod 176 though it was listed that it would. Had text message conversation with Alexandria from Classic. Only fits up to 2016. She was extremely nice in helping me. Took return with no problem. She told me I would need Model 3 80-256-161001-00. I haven’t ordered new one yet. Only reason for one star, didn’t fit.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Vieira Jr

customer_reviews.title: Fits our R-179 R-pod with the door in the back ...
customer_reviews.text: Fits our R-179 R-pod with the door in the back. It does take two people to put on (at least for me).
customer_reviews.author: Keith A Fulton

customer_reviews.title: Does not fit Forrest River Wolf Pup 17RP
customer_reviews.text: I did not like that it did not fit my RV. I took a chance that it would work as the dimensions looked right. I did not take into account the rooftop AC unit and the vent cover and the awning which made this just shy of working. I needed about 6 more inches for this to work. Not the sellers or the manufacturers fault as they were clear in their description. I am now trying to sell on Craigslist.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Held up well over the first winter.
customer_reviews.text: This cover held up well over its first winter. I will update later. The spring pollen did stain it some. Not tears and the zippers held well. I live in the Oregon Willamette Valley, so we don't get a lot of snow & ice. Just lots of rain. It fit my 2019 Forest River R-Pod 191 perfect. I purchased a separate hitch cover last year.
customer_reviews.author: mimioutcast

customer_reviews.title: Great R Pod cover
customer_reviews.text: Used this cover on my R Pod 190 last winter. It fit very well. Had to use some foam in a couple of places to prevent friction and wear, but not much. The cover looks great after one year in harsh Michigan winters. Will put in on for a second winter next week. Light weight and not difficult to put on. My wife and I installed it without much difficulty at all. I recommend this product for R Pod 190 and 189 since they are the same outside dimensions. May work on others as well
customer_reviews.author: Sail Away

customer_reviews.title: Fits  2020 Hummingbird 17RK
customer_reviews.text: Fits our Hummingbird perfectly, rear door lines up and everything. A bit awkward to put on (even with two people and step ladders). Also had to reinforce several spots. Can't really address durability yet, only been on about a month. Not waterproof, but keeps the driving rains from getting into potential areas that may leak. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: D. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Warranty
customer_reviews.text: The cover was good, the warranty service through Classic Accessories was outstanding. Yeah...I was bummed when my cover tore - but Classic Accessories made it right - and that is impressive. Buying a more expensive cover with a lifetime warranty turned out to be a great choice for us.
customer_reviews.author: S. Peters

customer_reviews.title: This is a great cover. It fits perfectly and I was able ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great cover. It fits perfectly and I was able to get it on by myself because it was so light. It's been in several wind storms and held up well and also dried quickly after the rain. When I took it off I had no difficulty getting it back in the bag that it came in as the bag has a zipper to expand the volume. I did use sponge pipe insulation to cover the sharp edges of the antenna and rain gutter spouts as well as the sharp corners at the bottom of my trailer.
customer_reviews.author: BobPop

customer_reviews.title: Short life
customer_reviews.text: We live east of Tuscon so it tends to be a little warm sometimes. Our cover lasted about a year and fell apart. It's like the material rotted.you could stick you finger through the material. This cover was on and off maybe six times. Granted Classic Accessories replaced it with no questions asked.
customer_reviews.author: Carole Hays

customer_reviews.title: Will not fit R-pod 176-T 2018
customer_reviews.text: This cover was stated by the manufacturer of the R-pod (Forest River) that it will fit an R-pod 176 T. This is not the case it will not fit a 2018 edition. The photo shows the cover fitting an older R-pod. Very disappointed 150.00 bucks down the drain.
customer_reviews.author: NVMom

customer_reviews.title: We bought this cover for our new RPOD 179 camper ...
customer_reviews.text: We bought this cover for our new RPOD 179 camper and just installed it for the winter. Really too soon to tell about how it will hold up over time. but it sure was well packaged and a breeze to install. The zipper door lines up perfectly with the trailer.
customer_reviews.author: Skimmerson

customer_reviews.title: SMALL size fits RPOD 172....
customer_reviews.text: I have a RPOD 172.... ordered the "SMALL" size and it fits - somewhat loosely.... I wish it was bit more snug. There are two cross straps to secure the cover to the RPOD. The two rear lower corners of the RPOD are somewhat sharp.... So I will be reinforcing this area with some fabric tape.
customer_reviews.author: J. Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Fits my Jayco Hummingbird 17RB pefectly!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this cover for our Jayco 17RB since there is no cover made specifically for a Jayco of this style. This cover fit our Jayco perfectly. I did add a couple of additional bungee tie points near the hitch and one in front of each wheel well. Cover it nicely and wasn't too difficult to install. I suggest two person install with two ladders.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Tears when it's windy
customer_reviews.text: Owned it for exactly one year. Got really windy yesterday (like 40 MPH gusts) and the thing tore up. Large 15 foot long tear along the top, totally ruined. I really wish it was thicker, more durable material. There were no sharp edges underneath, probably one of the seams came undone and just ripped up after that in the wind. Not worth $200.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Nolan

customer_reviews.title: Fits my Camping World Sattelite really good. It's helping keep that California sun from destroying ...
customer_reviews.text: Fits my Camping World Sattelite really good. It's helping keep that California sun from destroying the outside vent covers. We will see how it does when we eventually get rain again.
customer_reviews.author: Guy Clark

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t fit as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Product description said it would fit 20 foot camper but it didn’t fit our 17ft Jayco Hummingbird due to the rounded front and back of the camper. It was to tight and hard to put on. Don’t recommend for this camper.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Camper cover
customer_reviews.text: Cover has been installed for a month and is doing quite well. Fit perfectly. No moisture buildup... No rips or tears. I look forward to the spring to see if that continues.
customer_reviews.author: Camper Girl

customer_reviews.title: Protects our pod from the sun
customer_reviews.text: This is the second cover we've bought for our Rpod. There's a learning process required to put it on. The first lasted about 18 months before the sun ate it and about 36 months before we replaced it. But it was used less than half of that time. This cover is made from a different material that seems more durable. Won't know for about 3 years.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Yesterday we had hurricane Dorian go through Myrtle Beach. The first thing I did this morning was to check my camper out that we have in outdoor storage. The camper was fine and the cover was still on with no rips or tears. We had tropical storm wind gusts and heavy rain and that cover looked brand new this morning.
customer_reviews.author: JohnV

customer_reviews.title: Installed very easy with help from one other person.
customer_reviews.text: Seems to fit well, installed in a snap. Started at the front, another person and myself used shower curtain rods to lift it above the roof line and walked it to the back.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron H.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Cover!
customer_reviews.text: This cover fit my mini winnie like a glove! Easy to install and durable! Comes with a travel bag and patches. I love it! Stands up to high winds!
customer_reviews.author: RICH

customer_reviews.title: Fits 17’ Jayco Hummingbird
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our 17’ Jayco Hummingbird. It fits perfectly. Be sure to pad all sharp edges on the slide out and the drip rail above the awning. We also padded all four corners of the bottom of the camper. Also be sure to fold down the radio antenna so the cover slides easier. We had a pretty big wind storm go through and the cover performed nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Chris D.

customer_reviews.title: Best cover hands down!
customer_reviews.text: After building and revamping our covers for our r pod the last straw was when putting it the wind blasted by our house and ripped a huge whole in the custom one I had made. My husband promptly went in and orded this one. Except for figuring out how to easily put it on, which we have mastered now, it's the BEST $$$ we have spent. Should have done it years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Great protection in a hard winter
customer_reviews.text: When we put this on last fall I didn't know how bad the temps / ice / snow would be this year. It fits like a glove and best of all has provided great protection for my 190 R-Pod.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Fit on a Jayco Hummingbird 17FD
customer_reviews.text: Installed on a Jayco Hummingbird 17FD. Fit is very good. Came a bit short on the back end. Likely the Jayco is taller than the Rpod. Durability to be determined. The door zipper lines up with the door on the Jayco.
customer_reviews.author: BWB2

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service!
customer_reviews.text: Great customer service. This cover got to us in Alaska in a few days! Obviously this company has done the research and has figured out that it costs a few cents more to ship priority mail. I will order everything I need for my R-Pod from these folks! The cover was easy to put on and is great quality. We are pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Corliss Lannan

customer_reviews.title: Great fit
customer_reviews.text: Fits the rPod perfectly. Excited to add this to our camper. We believe it will assist in the storage and longevity of the camper. It was easy to install and secure in place.
customer_reviews.author: becky moody

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use...
customer_reviews.text: We were thrilled with how easy this was to put on our R POD, we have only had it on a couple of weeks. We are happy to keep the sun from melting our rig!
customer_reviews.author: Cijai

customer_reviews.title: One person install
customer_reviews.text: I did the install my self took my time, with just a ladder. This cover was well packed, after unpacking and separating the material, I did remove the antenna, they just unscrewed. It is nice that there is a tag that says to front. As you see in the pic it does partially cover the tires, about half way or so. Once it is installed I had to go around and straighten the seams, even after I tightened the straps did go around and adjust. The fit is snug.
customer_reviews.author: RW

customer_reviews.title: Front and Center Logo is Upside - UGH
customer_reviews.text: Well folks....Its on the Rpod without much fuss. It was exactly what I expected until we actually got it on the Pod. I can't say Im not disappointed. Anybody notice anything in the photo? This bothers me. Am I just too obsessive compulsive? Im thinking if they can't get their own logo right...what other quality issues are there? Would love to return it but goodness that's a lot of work...putting it on, taking it off, shipping it back, putting it on again. Im tired already!
customer_reviews.author: facingsouth

customer_reviews.title: Really nice quality - super happy with this cover
customer_reviews.text: Fits our 179 RPOD perfectly! Really nice quality - super happy with this cover.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, Good fit. Take it out of box , spread it out and roll it up from back to front. Two people required to put the cover on. Throw it over the top and roll it front to back. Easy-peasy. Bought ours for an RPod 180
customer_reviews.author: Babby

customer_reviews.title: Great RV Cover
customer_reviews.text: This is the second Classic Accessories RV cover I have purchased. The first was for another RV I owned. Both fit great. This one fits like a glove. Easy to install. Easy to store. The bag they come in has a zipper expansion so when you go to put the cover back in after using it, everything fits easily in the bag.
customer_reviews.author: Big Ragu

customer_reviews.title: I had high hopes for the cover it fit well over the trailer and looked good. But by May of 2018 it has started ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this RV cover in December of 2016. I had high hopes for the cover it fit well over the trailer and looked good. But by May of 2018 it has started to tear around one corner and on the top. I am very disappointed in this product and can not recommend it. I think by the end of the year it will be torn to shreds by the wind and sun here in New Mexico.
customer_reviews.author: Dan D.

customer_reviews.title: Classic Accessories camper cover
customer_reviews.text: Very good fit on a 2017 R Pod 180 which has the awning , lightweight so time will tell as far as its durability but so far very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Schaller

customer_reviews.title: Good fit for my Jayco Hummingbird
customer_reviews.text: Put this on a Jayco Hummingbird 17rk, same size and shape of the Rpod. So far so good. Only been on a month, seems like it will hold up. Like the vents.
customer_reviews.author: William Trafny

customer_reviews.title: Well made!
customer_reviews.text: Fits great on RP 179. Light weight. Should do the trick for a few years.
customer_reviews.author: Ringo

customer_reviews.title: A replacement for my trailer would be great.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this cover for my Ropd 179 in October of 2017 and both zippers have failed for the door entry. I own the model with the door behind the axle. Now it's been parked in the compound where I stood it and I have probably been in and out of 8 times and the zippers failed. What are you going to do about this problem Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Swenson

customer_reviews.title: Fit my Rpod 182G like a glove
customer_reviews.text: It’s a bit tight, but be patient and work all the slack out as you install this from front to back. I had the TV Antenna, AC unit and a MaxAir on the roof.
customer_reviews.author: Big-Foot

customer_reviews.title: So far, worth it
customer_reviews.text: Only had for a month or so. Fit is really good for our Rpod 179. Had a big wind storm, held up great.
customer_reviews.author: A.H.

customer_reviews.title: Didn't hold up after the first year
customer_reviews.text: Fits well did good job of protecting my camper. However in year 2 when I removed it, it's getting brittle. I don't know if I should try to patch or just throw it out. Maybe I'm expecting too much and it's normal to have to replace this type of cover so often. If you're looking for a longer term solution, this isn't it.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Girl

customer_reviews.title: It has worked well to keep weather off of our trailer RPod 178
customer_reviews.text: I used it to keep sun and weather off of my RPod. A bit tricky to get on the trailer
customer_reviews.author: Mo Stuff

customer_reviews.title: Fits 2015 R-POD 176T
customer_reviews.text: Sturdier fabric than my last cover. Fits great. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: LittleChip

customer_reviews.title: Easy to get into main door. Yes you need a ladder to put on. Rips super easy.
customer_reviews.text: Nice cover. Easy to get into my R Pod. But like a lot of people have said it RIPS very very very easy. I put tennis balls and re enforced the weak spots on the cover. Had it a month and put holes in it. Also I can see right through it. Hope it is uv protective.
customer_reviews.author: adam

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfect on our 183. Wintered very well here the Northwest.
customer_reviews.author: Marty A Elmore

customer_reviews.title: Beware ...Low quality fabric!!
customer_reviews.text: What started out as promising purchase became a huge disappointment. The cover quickly broke down in the sun! In as little as 6 months it was like paper tissue and shredded itself, totally un repairable. Very disappointing!
customer_reviews.author: Baz

customer_reviews.title: Durable & Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: This cover just survived a Cat 1 hurricane! It’s easy to install with 2 people & it’s proved it’s durability with this storm we just had. We’re very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline Cooley

customer_reviews.title: Great fit
customer_reviews.text: Fits our 2019 RPod camper well. Love the door access! Stow bag is great when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: Bunny Morrison

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fits the Rpod 179 like a glove. So far so good, was very easy to put up .
customer_reviews.author: alain b.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: We really like the Cover. It is a perfect fit for our 180 and good quality. I do have to mention the outstanding Customer Service!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Durable!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! We had winds that were strong enough to take down signs, trees, sheds and fences, as well as blow off shingles, snap an enormous pine tree in half, and blow a semi off the road. All that, and there isn't a tear anywhere in this cover. Totally worth it!!
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: nice product.
customer_reviews.text: fantastic material. i cut hole in the top so the fantastic fan could pop up and ventilate since it was a greenhouse with this thing.
customer_reviews.author: Daphne A Miles

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt fit 2017 rpod
customer_reviews.text: Really thin material, This cover will not fit the 2017 rpod with low profile ac unit. Its. Its not big enough. This cover may fit a teardrop 16 foot with no a/c unit, tv antena ect....The cover itself is light ripstop material very light material. If the cover would fit it looks like it would hold up against the wind and sunlight. If this is available make sure you get the correct one. I had to order twice and got a mispick each time, I had to order from a rv dealer to find out it doesnt fit.
customer_reviews.author: Chad from NY

customer_reviews.title: Light weight material, not for a Minnie Drop
customer_reviews.text: It won’t fit with a roof AC. You’ll need 3 people to install it. Although the measurements indicate it will fit a winnabego Minnie Drop, it just wont stretch over.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy!
customer_reviews.text: Product too tight, so tight that sharp corners of the trailer would of ripped it in no time, you are better of buying a tarp and putting it over.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Mendoza

customer_reviews.title: Hard to put on in a tight space
customer_reviews.text: This thing was impossible to put on if you have you trailer in a storage area with really tight spacing. I can’t say anything about durability as I returned it because I wasn’t able to get it on.
customer_reviews.author: Charles D. McKenrick

customer_reviews.title: Won't last a year.
customer_reviews.text: Didn't last a year in the Arizona sun. Already has tears in the fabric. The only good thing is they replaced it free. I have now gone through 3 of them and I am tired of them not even lasting 10 months.
customer_reviews.author: John Sheffield

customer_reviews.title: Fits a RPod 179 perfectly.
customer_reviews.text: The material is actually more durable that I expected it would be at this price. I've only had it for a few months but I've put in on and taken it off a few times without incident. So far I'm very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Ford Giles

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: After a year and four months of use we noticed a tear in our Classic Accessories PermaPro cover for our RP190. Filed an online claim and three days later received shipping notification for a replacement. No questions asked.
customer_reviews.author: Montroe Hopkins

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Fit camper perfect have not really been able to see how good in weather yet because first winter with it on. Seems durable.
customer_reviews.author: barbie

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 1 year.
customer_reviews.text: Mine lasted 1 year. Ripped in the wind. Split down the middle. I should have saved it and used the limited lifetime warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Jazz Trumpet

customer_reviews.title: You’re gonna need a ladder and extra hands!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit for my RP-177. Works perfectly and fits like a glove. Comes with repair tape, a carry bag, and throw bags to weight it down by connecting to snaps on the bottom of the cover.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew T. Morris

customer_reviews.title: Put it on my R-pod 180 fits good and seems very well made
customer_reviews.text: Put it on my R-pod 180 fits good and seems very well made
customer_reviews.author: #1 Uncle

customer_reviews.title: Better
customer_reviews.text: This fabric looks much more resilient than the "2-year cover" I just threw out.
customer_reviews.author: sfbj

customer_reviews.title: Great fit for Jayco 17rb
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this cover for my 2017 Jayco 17RB. Fits like a custom cover.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: This trailer cover has been the best. The fabric is durable and big enough to easily get on our trailer.
customer_reviews.author: Lizanne kruzel

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and good price
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly and stays on in windy weather. Good quality and good price.
customer_reviews.author: Cully

customer_reviews.title: Fit my 2018 Winnie Drop 1710!
customer_reviews.text: Fit my 2018 Winnie Drop 1710 perfectly. Even with air conditioner and awning. Fairly easy even for two short women, just used a ladder!
customer_reviews.author: MHausman

customer_reviews.title: thin material
customer_reviews.text: I felt it should have been thicker. Picture I felt look durable but it was thin material and not easy to cover.
customer_reviews.author: Esther Logelin

customer_reviews.title: It fits our rpod 179 well
customer_reviews.text: Fits our 2015 rpod 179. Husband was able to put this on alone. We are happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit. Easy set up arrived early. Yeah. Happy campers!
customer_reviews.author: Anita Bowers

customer_reviews.title: Fits Jayco Hummingbird Nicely!
customer_reviews.text: Nice cover, fits Jayco Hummingbird just about perfectly! I hope it last more than 2 seasons however.
customer_reviews.author: MEL

customer_reviews.title: Was very happy to find this cover that is heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: Was very happy to find this cover that is heavy duty. A lot of them just have the top reenforced. But this one has it everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Machelle R.

customer_reviews.title: but it fit great. No issues what so ever
customer_reviews.text: I was a little skeptical at first because we have a 2017 RP180, but it fit great. No issues what so ever, fairly easy application. Good material, I like rip stop, it is pretty thin but for the price...I can't complain.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Harris

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Better fit and make than the old unit we had that lasted only three years.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Winnebage drop 1710
customer_reviews.text: Purchased a small cover to fit my 2018 Winnebago Winnie drop 1710, fits good not perfect. until someone makes a cover for the Winnie it will work fine.
customer_reviews.author: sjonesy

customer_reviews.title: Great Service
customer_reviews.text: Bought this 2 year ago it started to tear. Sent in warranty Classic sent a new cover in 4 days, great service.
customer_reviews.author: Brian riches

customer_reviews.title: We've had some pretty fierce winds and so far damage
customer_reviews.text: I'll review again after a year or two. We've had some pretty fierce winds and so far damage. Also my husband installed by himself easily.
customer_reviews.author: chrisann

customer_reviews.title: Ease of installation, fits great.
customer_reviews.text: Installation was easy, it took two people and about 30 minutes. Next time it won't take as long.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great rapid cover
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit, sturdy fabric, easy installation using 2 people. What more can I say!
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn Pearson

customer_reviews.title: Nice fitbfor my Rpod 178. Wish the material was a little bit heavier and that's why I gave it four stars.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly and fits my Rpod 178 perfectly. Easy to get on with 2 people. I wish the material was a little bit heavier and that's why I gave it four stars.
customer_reviews.author: Marsha

customer_reviews.title: ... I've had it on a year and it works great!
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly and I've had it on a year and it works great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good fit!
customer_reviews.text: It fit perfectly over my 2016 RP 177. It seems like quality material. It was a little hard to get over the top of the trailer but there's not much you can do about that.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: The product is amazing and very easy to put on
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Kotz

customer_reviews.title: Seems very well made. Been on camper for 3 ...
customer_reviews.text: Seems very well made. Been on camper for 3 weeks in storms and wind. Has held in place and held up well
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be pretty good quality
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be pretty good quality. Shipped super fast. A little tricky to put on, but most likely any cover would be. I store my camper in a fairly windy area in Colorado. So far it's been great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Service was good. The cover was of good quality. Overall good value.
customer_reviews.author: W Paul F McCaughey

customer_reviews.title: Quality cover
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to use on our new Rpod 180. Fit is perfect. Snugs down nice and tight. The picture show it skin tight across the top.The truth is there is plenty of room for your roof top a/c etc.Door zipper is in the perfect place. It has held up well through snow/rain and high winds. Get a friend to help you install it and you are good to go!
customer_reviews.author: H. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Plese read before buying
customer_reviews.text: When I opened the package and felt the material I kind of knew it wasn't going to be good... This cover is made out of the same thing pop tents are made out of water goes right through this cover anywhere it is touching your camper... I will say it fit nice and looks good but the first night a train I could see the cover sticking to my camper.... I knew right then water was going right through the material.... Luckily for me I store my camper in underground storage where it doesn't get rained on but if you're buying this to store your camper outside please don't do it.... This is absolutely poor quality
customer_reviews.author: Tony leone

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my rpod 180. It fits perfectly. Hoping it holds up for the NY winter!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle BT

product_meta.title: Classic Accessories PermaPro Heavy Duty R-Pod Travel Trailer Cover, Model 2, Grey
product_meta.description: Size:Model 2Specially designed PermaPRO covers provide maximum protection to keep your RV in top shape all year long. Air vents, tensions panels and extra-long zipper pulls are just a few of the things that make this cover one of a kind. Less bulky than most, our PermaPRO cover fits in provided expandable storage bag. Extra strength PermaPRO rip stop fabric repels water and protects against dirt and sun damage. Air vent system and quick drying PermaPRO fabric combine to reduce wind stress and vent inside moisture, Zippered panels allow access to the RV doors and storage compartments, Integrated strap attachment and weighted toss bag system eliminates crawling under the RV to install tension straps, Tension panels reduce cover stress when tightening the straps, Zippered storage bag expands for easy packing, Not designed to entirely cover the wheels or legs, Limited lifetime warranty.
feature_bullets: Fits R-Pod models RP-171, RP-172, RP-176, RP-176T, and RP-177

RV ACCESSORIES: Adjustable front and rear tension panels and elasticized hem corners provide a custom fit, air vent system and quick drying PermaPRO fabric combine to reduce wind stress and vent inside moisture

RV STORAGE COVER: Extra strength, lightweight PermaPRO ripstop fabric repels water and protects against dirt and sun damage, integrated strap attachment and weighted toss bag system eliminates crawling under the RV to install tension straps, tension panels reduce cover stress when tightening the straps
RV COVER WITH ACCESS PANELS: Zippered panels allow access to the RV doors and storage compartments, panels allow access to all four sides
CAMPER COVER WITH WARRANTY: Zippered storage bag unzips and expands for easy packing, includes lifetime warranty
